about_the_game:
In the distant future, the CYBERACE cybernetic research enterprise is holding their very first "EX-XDRiVER Championship," a racing championship with a priceless reward—any cybernetic enhancement that the winner desires. With such an enticing reward, contestants have traveled from around the world to compete in a high stakes, winner-take-all tournament in hopes to make their deepest desires come true.

RIDE THE NEON CIRCUIT

Immerse yourself in a futuristic landscape of neon, sleek raceways and an addicting high-energy soundtrack. Enjoy a track list with over 15 artists providing a wide variety of original music & licensed songs!

PUSH THE LIMITS OF RACING

Traditional rhythm game gameplay will be easy to learn but require mastery and practice as you tackle technical high-level tracks. Obtain "LIMITs" from hitting notes and drifts as accurately as you can—go for perfect scores, faster finish times, and world records!

HONE YOUR SKILLS, COMPETE FOR GLORY

Play solo in an arcade-style credits mode to unlock songs for Free Play—or if you're feeling competitive, connect online and race against others to see who deserves the title of XDRV Champion!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any 64-bit Linux distribution or SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple Silicon and/or Intel 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
